description: Chair Peak Circumnavigation is a popular ski tour out the the Seattle area.  You'll find many write ups and on good days there will be others with you.  No technical gear needed, but we brought ski crampons.
directions: I-90 east to North Bend, then to Snoqualmie Pass.  Go to the farthest north parking lot at the Alpental Ski Area.
title: Chair Peak Circumnavigation
